snippet: Geraldine Smith, 19, of Sheepshead Bay, was charged on Tuesday with assault, child endangerment and assaulting a person under age 7 in the death of Jayden Smith.
abstract: Brooklyn woman Geraldine Smith is charged in connection with the death of her 2-year-old son, latest in a string of suspicious child deaths in New York City investigated by police.
lead_paragraph: Geraldine Smith, 19, of Sheepshead Bay, was charged on Tuesday with assault, child endangerment and assaulting a person under age 7 in the death of Jayden Smith.

headline.main: Woman Charged in Death of Her Son, 2, in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Woman Charged in Death of Her Son, 2, in Brooklyn
